snippet.title: Level Zero: Extraction—Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Multiplayer Extraction Horror | Steam Beta March 15
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1456940/Level_Zero/
Request access to Closed Beta on Steam ⬆️

Level Zero: Extraction is a multiplayer extraction horror with high-stakes asymmetric PvPvPvE and immersive FPS combat. Embark on dangerous scavenging expeditions—solo or with a team. Or play as an alien monster that can only be killed with light and make sure no mortal escapes alive. 

Closed Beta begins on March 15th; sign up by clicking 'Request Access' on the game's Steam page.

*********

Follow Level Zero: Extraction for the latest news and development updates. ▼
Discord: https://tblink.co/LevelZeroDiscord
Twitter (X): https://twitter.com/LevelZeroGame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/LevelZeroVideogame
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@level_zero_game
